name: Post-Metal
description: Atmospheric and dense metallic riffs, unconventional songwriting, sonic experimentation, and adoption of eclectic influences.

children.name: Atmospheric Sludge Metal
children.description: Combines slow, churning guitar riffs and thunderous percussion with dark, extensive otherworldly sonic landscapes.

children.name: Atmospheric Sludge Metal
children.description: Combines slow, churning guitar riffs and thunderous percussion with dark, extensive otherworldly sonic landscapes.

children.name: Blackgaze
children.description: Fuses tremolo-picked riffing, intense drumming and harsh vocal techniques with mellow, dreamy textures, major-key melodies and extended build-ups.

children.name: Doomgaze
children.description: Gloomy and sombre atmosphere, amplified by the slow tempo and melancholy of Doom Metal, combined with the effects, washes of sound, and vocals found within Shoegaze.
